description:
Take control of the cosmic dance between two blazing fireballs hurtling through space. Tap left or right to rotate the twins as they remain synced in a circular orbit in 60+ levels. Avoid countless obstacles through the stages of increasing celestial difficulty to unlock their mystery! You can play it on your own or compete with friends, either way will provide you with everlasting fun as you strive to beat the records you've already set. 

Get ready for the newest addicting app! Two Hot Balls is an up-and-coming app joining the ranks of popular, “simple yet addicting” games. 

About the App 

7 WORLDS - This dual game requires unprecedented skill, coordination, timing — and a steady VERY hand! - Explore the entire universe of 9 challenges over 7 worlds. - Replay or jump to any world, but be warned — you'll never survive the advanced levels unless you have earned your place the hard way!

The app consists of two balls rotating clockwise and counter-clockwise to avoid stationary and moving beams. As if that wasn't challenging enough, the rounds must be completed within a certain number of moves. This creates additional play value since you will want to keep playing the same round, even after you beat it, to improve on your score. 

In the game ,,Two Ball Game'' there are 7 stages. Each stage of the app consists of several levels. As the stages increase in number, they also increase in difficulty and speed. For example, in level one you may be dodging a few stationary beams, but in level seven, the beams are different shapes and sizes, they may rotate and move in different directions, and they may turn invisible. 

The levels become very challenging and addicting to conquer, so it is great that you don’t get a certain number of lives. When you die you just go back to the beginning of the game you were already on, no dying and going back to level one! 

This game will definitely test your speed and reaction time as moving beams zip by and you have to adjust the position of your balls accordingly. With the large number of games in each level and the large difference in skill requirements between levels, it’s great for those who are new to games as well as experienced gamers.

App Features 

The home screen is simple and clean. Containing only three icons (play, settings, and game center), it is quick and easy to navigate to exactly where you want to go. The settings screen is also simple, containing controls for the music and sound volume. The game has a pause feature so you won’t lose your spot if you get interrupted, though this shouldn't be a problem since the games move so quick! 

It is easy for beginners to learn the app controls with the help of the quick tutorial at the beginning of Level 1. It illustrates that when you tap the left side of the screen, the balls rotate counter-clockwise by a fraction, the longer you hold it, the farther they will move. When you touch the right side of the screen, the balls rotate in a clockwise direction. 

The app also allows you to share your progress with friends, via Google+ and Facebook so you can stay competitive! 

MESMERIZING MUSIC
= Audio in Two Ball Game features the electronic styling of a world-renowned DJ.
= Each hypnotic track has been specifically designed for the game. 

Why It’s Great 

The app is simple and challenging, fast paced and fulfilling, addicting but easy to pause… It’s the perfect app to have while waiting in a long line or when you have a free minute between classes. It can keep you entertained for an hour, or you can sneak a quick game in just 30 seconds. And you can be an expert gamer or someone new to game apps to enjoy it! 


UNIVERSAL APP 
| Enjoy Two Ball Game on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch!

ULTIMATE SUPPORT 

= Contact us at [TwoBallGame@appidea.com]

Website: http://appidea.com 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/554637954658621 
Google +: https://plus.google.com/106406031217657105509

The sequel to the critically acclaimed vertical shmup blasts onto Android!

description:
미국에 '핀볼'이 있다면 한국엔 '웜볼'이 있다!
중독성 보장! 전세계 유저들과 실력을 경쟁해보세요!

우주 먼지들 중 극소수는 미지의 힘으로부터 소행성이 될 자질을 부여받습니다. 신들은 이 특별한 먼지를 '웜볼'이라고 부릅니다. 웜볼은 웜홀을 타고 우주를 여행하며 점점 위대한 소행성으로 진화합니다. 여러분은 이제 우주의 관리자 중 한 명입니다. 여러분의 힘으로 웜볼을 위대한 소행성으로 키워주세요! 

• 간단한 원터치 조작 방치 키우기 인디게임
- 위성을 모아 최대 속도를 올려주세요.
- 소행성이 진화하면 외형이 변화하고 특수 능력이 생깁니다.
- 우주 여행에 필요한 여러가지 능력치들을 강화시켜주세요.

• 폭탄 피하기 형식의 키우기게임
- 적 소행성의 움직임을 보고 타이밍에 맞게 웜홀을 탭하세요.
- 단계가 올라갈수록 노가다와 집중력이 필요합니다. 
- 레벨 업하고 스탯을 올리며 육성 방향을 결정해주세요.

• 끝이 없는 무한 난이도의 신개념 키우기
- 숨겨진 시스템들을 활용해 높은 단계까지 살아남아 보세요.
- 도전 모드에 도전해서 많은 골드를 획득해 보세요.
- 클리커 육성을 통해 더 쉽게 장애물들을 돌파할 수 있습니다.

※ 게임을 종료하거나 방치해도 골드를 얻을 수 있습니다!
※ 오토 버튼을 누르면 방치형 키우기 진행 할 수 있습니다!
※ 최종 변화 모습은 무엇일까요?

※ 주의! 게임을 지우시면 지금까지 플레이한 누적 데이터가 
모두 삭제됩니다.

※ 문의 및 버그 신고

description:
Thunderstorm Run and Jump

The greatest adventure now come in your hands.
Fight with the kids Power to accomplish mission.
Collect coins so you can choose your hero.
There are 18 power you can pick. They are Thunder Boy, Fire Boy, Water Boy, Bolt Boy, Earth Quake Boy, Brick Boy, Leaf Boy, Taifun boy, Lava boy, Dark Boy, Knight boy, Branch boy, Flame boy, Warrior boy, Sun boy, Magnet Boy, Sand Boy, and Paladin Boy

Thunderstorm Run and Jump is the most addictive endless running game ever exist.
We have many obstacles that will make you feel in the game world.
Don't forget to take the Power Balls along the way you run! Those Balls can give you power to avoid and crush every obstacle ahead.

Watch Out!! Bad and evil enemy has desire to kill you!
After evil alien failed getting the power, they brain-washes Cyclone Boy to be his ally. Now, bad enamy help Alien to defeat the other Boys.
Avoid Cyclone Boy attack and reach the highest score to compete with another player.

Come on Guys all around the world, Download and play Thunderstorm Run and Jump game and fight with your favorite character


How to play:
Tap to Jump
Tap and Hold to jump Higher
Tap twice to Jump in the air
================================================================================

Game Mode and Features :
* 18 different Boy powers available in game
* Infinite number of stages
* Forever free
* Endless adventure
* Avoid every obstacles
* Cute 2D graphic design
* Fun and addictive casual game
* High Quality Sound effect and music

Disclaimer:
This game is not affiliated with any animated series, movie, film, cartoon, or anime! Any similarity with the mentioned brand or characters was purely coincidental. We have tried to use common assets and we declare that we do not affiliated with the mentioned brand.
This game was made by Shadow Snake Studio as fun. If there is any similarity, it is coincidentally happened. For any question contact us at email: darren.edogawa77@gmail.com

description:
Crazy Ball is a 3D gravity balancing game that utilizes realistic physics.
The goal of the player is to collect coins spread around the level using the ball.

~~~~~ Crazy Ball FEATURES ~~~~~

• Smooth ball physics
• Challenging level course design
• Colorful graphics
• Roll, hop, jump and spin around to collect coins
• Fine tuned controls

The game works by moving the joystick in the desired direction and rolling your ball along the path to find coins and finish by locating the end base. Once this is done, the level is complete and a new challenge begins!

~~~~~ PERFECT FOR ~~~~~

• Solo gameplay
• Entertaining marble/ball control
• Relaxing after a long day
• Players ready for fun
• Decreasing boredom
• Those who like a challenge
• Challenging game boards
• Those who enjoy marble games


Can your friends win the pot? Share the game with them and find out today!

Thanks and have fun playing!

~~~~~
FreezeNova Studio
http://www.freezenova.com
https://www.facebook.com/FreezeNovaStudio
https://twitter.com/FreezeNova

description:
魔法の杖でマジカルアイテムを狙って・撃って・GETしよう！200万人が熱狂した大人気射的ゲーム「the射的！」「海賊射的！」に続く第3弾★直感型マジカルシューティングゲーム「ねらって☆マジカル！」が登場！！
面倒な登録や難しい操作は一切不要！無料で今すぐダウンロード！！

「ねらって☆マジカル！」は魔法の世界をモチーフにした、マジカルシューティングゲームです。
ダンジョンにはマジカルアイテムがいっぱい！相棒の魔法の杖"マルバス"と一緒にGETしに行こう！

遊び方はとっても簡単。

①マジカルアイテムを撃ち落とす
②マジカルアイテムを合成して魔法弾を作る
③ダンジョンをクリアする

たったこれだけ！

加速度センサーを使用しているので、実際にアイテムを撃ち落とす感覚を楽しめます。

端末を上下左右に傾けながら、マジカルアイテムに照準を合わせ、画面タッチで魔法を発射！！
魔法の飛距離や手ぶれなど、アイテムを落とすにはちょっとコツが必要だけど、
コツをつかめば魔法を繰り出す腕が驚くほど上がっていきます！

マジカルアイテムの種類は200種類！
妖精の粉やピラミッド、ドラゴンの牙など、不思議なアイテムが盛りだくさんです。

GETしたマジカルアイテムは、合成すると魔法弾に！
最大5つまで組み合わせることができ、難易度の高いマジカルアイテムを手に入れると、より強力な魔法弾を作ることができます。
どのマジカルアイテムでどんな魔法弾が出来るのか！？それは作ってからのお楽しみ★
どんどんマジカルアイテムを撃ち落として、いろんな組み合わせを試してみよう！

ダンジョンを進んでいくと、ドラゴンに遭遇することも…！？
火を噴くドラゴンの攻撃を受けると、一定時間操作ができなくなるので、
タイミングよくドラゴンを攻撃しよう！
ドラゴンを倒すとレベルもアップしていきます★

ダンジョンをクリアしてステージを進めば進むほど、豪華でレアなマジカルアイテムが出現します！
ただし！ダンジョンクリアに失敗するとGETしたマジカルアイテムは全て没収されてしまうので要注意！
全種類のマジカルアイテムをGETすれば、アナタはもう一流のマジカルスナイパー★
さぁ、今すぐ魔法の世界へ出かけよう！


《ねらって☆マジカル!　のオススメポイント》
◆加速度センサー付きで、アイテムを撃ち落とす感覚が楽しめる！
◆マジカルシューティングゲーム！大人気ゲーム「the射的！」「海賊射的！」の進化版です。
◆かんたん＆手軽に遊べるので、ちょっとした隙間時間にピッタリ！
◆豪華なマジカルアイテムが200種類登場！全て集めてコレクションしよう！


-株式会社コロプラ提供-

description:
Fish hunting is a simple an addictive, fun and awesome archery fishing game using bow & arrow.

Pull back or Hook the arrow from the bow, make a proper direction of shooting target, the far you pull the powerful the fish shoot.

Want to become a fish hunter? Wanna have fun shooting different kinds of fishes? Want to have fish live hunting experience? Then fish hunting is the hunting game you must be looking for.

Experience, the amazing game play, with some stunning underwater graphics, in this fish game. Have, a great time as a fish hunter, shooting different breeds of small as well as big fishes, in this fishing game.

Also experience the beauty of the underwater scenery, in this big fish shooting game. Develop your shooting skills, as a fish hunter, in hunting down, the big fishes, which will fetch you more points in this fish game.

Become, a skilled fish hunter, by shooting and hunting down, a large number of fishes in this fish game. Experience the joy of underwater shooting, by playing this big fish shooting game.

Get more points, by shooting, the swift moving big fish, in this fishing game. Score as high as possible, by hunting down, some really big fishes as a fish hunter.

Beat your top score, by killing, as many fishes as possible, in this fishing game.

GAME FEATURES:

1. Smooth Animated fish moving in water.
2. Good graphics, easy to play.
3. Shoot fishes with arrows ( max 3 lifes ).
4. shoot fishes, make hat-trick, get one extra life.
5. realistic fish animation experience with effective sound effects.
6. escape of shooting “Obstacles”.
7. challenging and exciting an addictive game.
8. enjoy the real fish hunting experience.
9. require lots of practice to become a archery master.

Fish hunting is one of the best fish games. Download this top fishing game, for free, and have some real fun, in your leisure time, by shooting and hunting down fishes.
short_desc: Awesome and colourful fishing game for android

description:
«This game is too casual and too hardcore at the same time»
(Some of the testers)

«Spin VC» — simple arcade to test reaction, where you need to tap the screen when the pointer is in the green zone. One click — one jump athlete. The game ends when you miss or do not press on the screen too long.

If you can make 50 jumps — congratulations, you have a reaction to a fighter pilot.


P.S. Because of its simplicity, the game is enough even minimal performance device. There are no long downloads (there is no downloads!), lags and freezes — you run the application and play a second later.
title: Spin VC

description:
The "Button Clicker" game of has a simple goal: PRESS THE BUTTON!. Yes, when you start pressing the button you can't stop it ...

NEW!: World Leaderboard!
NEW!: Now two players Bluetooth game !

It's inspired in many web browser games like the "Cookie Clicker" or the "Candy Box".

Just don't stop pressing the button.
The good news is that there is a store where you can buy Automatons that will press the button for you. These automatons or robots will never stop pressing the button. You can purchase automata by spending some of your clicks (bank clicks).
You can also buy upgrades to increase the performance of your clicks or upgrade the automatons production you have.

✔ You can choose to play single player (against time) or a duel between two players at a time limit, bluetooth game.
✔ Every time you get beat a time, your score will we recorded in the local mobile ranking.
✔ Game is automatically saved every 30 seconds. Also when you exit the game.

Enjoy the game!

Legal notice
---------------
This application complies with the policies of Google Play content.

This app is created just for the purpose of entertainment, its free and supported only by advertising.

Any suggestion or bug report is welcome. Please, before writing a bad review contact us by email at: jdpapps@gmail.com

description:
A Thug In Time is a top-down shooter that takes you on a journey through time! Kai is a chosen time traveler, instructed to collect time crystals scattered throughout time, in order to save humanity from future destruction! Players can use 35 unique weapons to decapitate, burn, freeze, laser, shoot, bomb and destroy over 20 varying enemies and eight mini-bosses and their bosses! Each kill has individual physics based purely on reaction using no death animations. Use a variety of power ups and weapons to survive and create havoc through over 65 levels throughout the Viking-Age, Wild West, 1930′s Chicago, and modern-day New York!

Features:

· Decapitate, freeze, burn as well as riddle with bullet and laser fire your enemies with more than 35 explosive weapons
· In game powerups that include: fire bombs, freeze bombs and cutter blades
· Battle through 65 levels set in four time periods: Viking-Age, Wild West, 1930’s mob infested Chicago and modern-day New York
· Obliterate more than 20 types of unique enemies
· No death animations, each kill has its own unique physics based reaction
· Conquer time travel as well as eight bosses and their mini-bosses
· Stunning graphics with advanced lighting techniques
· Hours of gameplay with an enormous amount of content
title: A Thug In Time

description:
***BETA VERSION***DO NOT RATE***UNFINISHED CONTENT***
***DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK***INSERT MORE WARNINGS HERE***
In a sudden twist of fate, you must take on the role of a monkey and take down as many nonchalant tourists as possible with your flying turds! Flick the screen to launch poop at zoo tourists and make them pay for locking you up in an exhibit!

Is this based on a true story, you ask? But of course: http://youtu.be/O4XYturRIJU?t=3m4s Poop flinging is a dangerous hobby enjoyed by many animals. Monkeys, having a greater emotional attachment to those around them, can be more easily affected by the loss of a wife, child, or friend to another exhibit, zoo, or tranquilizer. When the world comes crashing down around their tails, many monkeys resort to poop flinging to release their pent-up anger.

Frequently Asked Questions:
Q: Why are all of the tourists white?
A: We ask ourselves the same question.

Q: Why are you promoting monkey awareness?
A: Few people understand the true depravity experienced by monkeys in captivity. I'm here to not just make them understand it, but to experience it for themselves.

Q: How many types of poop exist?
A: As long as there is imagination, poop can take on new forms.

Q: Why is my game having a problem?
A: This is a beta and has not been tested on different devices.
short_desc: Fling for your freedom!

description:
Welcome to Frozen Jewels Dash, the best and addictive match-3 game!

Are you a super fan of diamonds or jewels style games? If the answer is yes, Frozen Jewels Dash is the game that you must have in your game collection. It’s expected that this game will lead you to extremely interesting experiences.

Frozen Jewels Dash is a match-3 puzzle game with classic and addictive gameplay. Like another jewels or diamonds game, just tap or touch and match jewels by your way to get highest score, and pass as many levels as you can. Especially, you can play with your friends in game center to see who get the highest score.

Frozen Jewels Dash is a free game in the genres of puzzle, arcade or casual which will present you lots of pleasant hours. It is a simple but extremely fun match-3 game. By playing this game you may find yourself hopelessly addicted to tapping or touching the glorious jewels. 

Various jewels, diamonds, beautiful graphics, smooth gameplay and awesome blast effects make this jewel game to be great, a best way to kill your time!
-------------------------------

FEATURES:
- 3 Game Modes: Time Rush, Endless and Dash.
- Game center integration.
- 7 identical jewels.
- Various items in game.
- Nice sound and music, beautiful graphics.
- Auto save game so that you can continue whenever you want.
-------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap or touch 3 or more jewels of the same color.
- For endless mode: Clear the jewels as more as you can and meet the target for each level. Endless relaxing!
- For rush mode: You have 60 seconds to tap the jewels as fast as possible. Let’s see how many score you can get within 60 seconds. Compare score and challenge with your friends to see who get the highest score!
- For dash mode: You have to break blocks as fast as you can to reach to the next level. You'll get time bonus after reach the next level. Try to survival as long as you can in this mode and earn the score as more as you can. Let's see how far you can go!
-------------------------------

TIPS:
- Many jewels blast at the same time, you’ll get the higher score.
- Use the item dragon stone wisely to explode all the jewels with same color.
- Timer item will add extra time.
- Treasure chest will give you amount of bonus score based on your level.

-------------------------------
By playing Frozen Jewels Dash, you will love the fun, creativity and excitement of this great casual game.
Any questions or advice, please send us e-mail. Have fun!
Best wishes to you.
short_desc: Fun match-3 jewels game! Easy to play, hard to stop!

description:
Crush The Tower, play tower Crush an epic game, you have to tap as quickly as you can to save the 5 princesses in the tower. Upgrade and evolve in battles of action and strategy.
Tap left and right to avoid the obstacles like blade saws, goblins, dragons and many other spiky obstacles. 

Crush The Tower by tapping and jump from left to right and vice versa and keep dodging the obstacles. Time runs out quickly so keep chopping! Arm yourself and crush your enemies. For honor and glory!

Chop with a big axe as a lumberjack would do with a tree. Start as a poor knight with a wooden helmet, collect coins and upgrade your outfit to golden armor and a golden axe (see the upgrade menu in summary). 

Time is limited (see bar at the top), so keep chopping as fast as you can, each hit will give you additional time. Get combo bonuses when you are tapping fast enough and don't hit obstacles (combo bonus = coin value multiplier).

At each 100 tower blocks you chop away as a trained timberman, a princess is held that you have to save. The tower will get harder and more dangerous after each princess. The first 3 princesses will unlock a special potion, that should make thing easier for you to crush the castle. When unlocked the potions will appear randomly in the gameplay.

There are many Quests (achievements) that give you extra money when you unlock them. Each time there are 3 active quests you can complete to get free extra coins, check them at the top of the summary menu.

Keep in mind that the higher you reach in the castle tower, the more lives obstacles will cost when you hit them. And time will go quicker and quicker the higher you go. There is a coin doubler available in the shop, it's an upgrade that will last forever.

Armor upgrades Knight:
- Hammer = Each hit will buy you more time
- Helmet = Get more lives
- Armor = Coins and bags appear more often

Power ups upgrades:
- Potions = Will drop more often
- Wombo Combo = Higher combo bonuses possible (coin value multiplier)
- Time Machine = Timer will go slower


Daily bonus:
In the main menu you will find a daily reward icon, get free gold every day you play. Check the countdown timer when you can collect your next coins reward.

Knight skins available:
- Bored Zombie skin
- Viking Penguin skin
- Famous Bird skin
- Undead pirate mask
- Cute Panda mask
- Rainbow Unicorn Mask

description:

148apps.com

***************** 

Hear ye, hear ye, good people of the realm: Super Kiwi Castle Run is the ultimate medieval adventure game!

Welcome to the knightly adventure Super Kiwi Castle Run! Before embarking on your quest, make sure you’re mentally and physically prepared to go the distance. Run as far and for as long as you can, overcoming the various miscreants (guards, witches and dragons, etc) that get in your way. Touch your screen to jump, then let go to land and avoid these villains.

Throughout your adventure, unlock heroes each with their own special ability and choose your favorite to play with. The Knight has the power to jump, while the Wizard flies and the Archer glides through the air. Explore all the corners of the castle, from the drawbridge to the castle tower, passing through the dungeons. Take a trip to the Shoppe to procure potions and boosts, or restyle your hero with a change of costume.

Last but not least, don’t be selfish… share this quest with your friends by using Facebook connect. Your reward will be even greater if you invite them to help you accomplish joint challenges in the castle tower. If you want to be the bravest of all, participate in the weekly tournaments and see where you rank in comparison to your comrades and the rest of the world!

Ready to become a Super Kiwi? It’s this way!

***************** 

In Super Kiwi: Castle Run, there’s also:
- funny, colorful graphics

- 3 different heroes (knight, wizard, archer)

Please note, Super Kiwi Castle Run is a free game, containing objects purchasable in-game.

Super Kiwi Castle Run is published by Is Cool Entertainment. http://www.superkiwi.com

description:
This is a arcade puzzle game that stacks the falling blocks (bricks) with the same colors. 

[How To Play]
• Stack the falling blocks on a specific location using the button 1, 2 and 3.
• Blocks disappear when three or more blocks with the same colors are stacked horizontally or vertically together.
• The game ends when the stack of blocks reach the top of the playing field and no new blocks can enter.
• During the game, Item Blocks will appear. For more information, please see 'About Item Blocks' in the help of the application.
• As you go higher levels, the blocks will be falling faster. Blocks of new color will be added as you reach specific levels.
• You can hold and use Item Block by the button 'Hold Item'.

[Permissions used by this app]
● Full network access
Use a connect to mobile network (3G, LTE, etc.)
● View network connections
Check the status of your mobile network (3G, LTE, etc.)
● Prevent device from sleeping
Use to prevent the screen off during play game
● Access bluetooth settings and pairing
Use for multiplayer via bluetooth

description:
VGB is a GameBoy emulator. It runs Classic, Color, and Super GameBoy games on your phone or tablet. VGB also emulates the pocket printer addon, link cable, rumble pack, cheat codes, and comes with cheats for dozens of popular games. Save your game progress at any moment, or even rewind gameplay back in time. Brag about it to your friends, then let them start playing where you have left off. Or play together over WiFi. VGB supports GoogleTV and lets you play using Xperia Play, Moga, iCade, Wiimote, Sixaxis, Nyko PlayPad, and other gamepads.

* Specifically optimized for Android devices, using assembly language and hardware acceleration to run GBC games as fast as possible.
* Supports full screen landscape and portrait modes, with many special effect options and customizable skin.
* Supports Moga and iCade gamepads, Nyko PlayPad, Xperia Play, Wiimote and Sixaxis.
* Supports GoogleTV devices running Android 4.x (Jelly Bean), such as LG G2/G3.
* The built-in Cheatopedia offers cheat codes for many popular GBC games.
* Save gameplay at any point and go back to that point once your character gets killed.
* Rewind gameplay 16 seconds back with a single keypress.
* Share your current progress in a GBC game with other users via State Exchange feature.
* Use GameLink emulation to play with other users over local network or Internet.
* Play with your hardware keyboard, gamepad, touch screen, or accelerometer.
* Record game soundtrack to MIDI files and use them as ringtones.
* On-screen buttons can be freely rearranged.

Please notice that VGB will not play GBA games: you will need VGBA for that. VGB package itself does not contain any games. You should place your own game files onto the SD card before running VGB.

Please, do not run any software you do not own with VGB. The author cannot and will not tell you where to find free GameBoy games.

Please, report any encountered problems here:

http://groups.google.com/group/emul8
what_is_new:
* GameBoy model and other hardware options will now be saved.
* Greatly improved the Layout Editor, fixing many bugs.
* Layout Editor now lets you resize screen in both dimensions.
* Screen rectangle will stay centered while resizing.
* Buttons gravity will be restored when resetting layout.
* Made states/screenshots deletion more reliable.
short_desc: Best GameBoy emulator. Has cheats, netplay, game rewinding, Moga support.
title: VGB - GameBoy (GBC) Emulator

description:
고등학생이 창업한 회사 'Bill Bird' 에서 새로운 게임을 선보입니다!!!

계속하여 살아남는 캐주얼 아케이드 게임 The Esper( 더 에스퍼 ) !

짜릿한 게임 진행과 카툰 그래픽의 절묘한 콜라보레이션!!

초능력 아이템을 이용해 여러 가지 패턴과

랜덤하게 생기는 적들을 처치하고 살아남으세요!

=============스토리==============

갱들이 넘치는 '빌 버드 시티'에 살고있는 주인공.

'빌버드 시티'에 살던 주인공은 생필품을 사기 위해 슈퍼마켓에 가게 되었는데, 

하필 그곳에서 맞닥뜨린 갱들중에 가장 질이 나쁜 '0 NINE' 갱단에게 시비를 트이게 된다.

평소에 자존심이 강한 주인공은 저항을 하며 '0 NINE' 갱원들에게 쫒기며 

막다른 골목을 마주치게 되었다.

그때 주인공의 눈에 들어온 것은 열려있는 건물의 문이었다.

최후의 탈출구로 건물 안에 들어가게 되는데...

==================================================

The Esper는 SK에서 주관한 2015 Smarteen App Challenge 공모전에 참가해 최우수상을 수여받은 작품입니다.

한국애니메이션고등학교 2인 디자인 팀 'O NINE' 의 도움을 받아 프로젝트를 진행하였습니다.

=====================업데이트 로그======================

1.0.1 첫 출시

1.0.2 튜토리얼 추가 및 잔 버그 개선

description:
Start building Today.
There are a lot of houses, cars, builds. It is up to you to choose. Each of them has its own unique style. Pick the one you like best and build it ! Show that you are the Mine and Craft master. 

Architect build craft is a addictive building game in a blocky 3D world. As a miner and architect, you need to build constructions out of textured cubes in this 3D block world. You have not to explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, grow plants. All is there for you . You just need to use them to make the perfect building. Use your creativity and imagination!
It has several levels and in each level, your goal is to reproduce exactly the given map which can be a house, a train, a car ... Start with the easiest one and continue progressively.
You have in your inventory many blocks, objects and tools. Each block has his own texture the player has an unlimited amount. To see the map that you want to to build, you can split the screen. 
A lot of maps has already been added.
This is not an exploration game but a creative games with cubes, it includes a large amount of different blocks that you are free to use to craft your world. 
Architect Build Craft is inspired by a popular crafting game, is still in development and contains 35 blocks for now.

Features :
An original building game. A lot of tools that you have never seen before like a tool that allow you to change the color of blocks.
Many levels, each of them inspired by famous youtubers worlds. There are a villager house for example and even a Tennis Court!
35 free blocks and tools, all textured including different grounds, tools, plants and more…. You start with a few blocks and gradually get the totality of them to build an empire.
You build the day, the night or sunset.
Divide the screen to see what you need to build. Dig, add the blocks, use and grow your building skills with complex levels.
You can save and load your progression. You can delete your map and correct it if you have done mistakes. Live an amazing and unique experience.
Spontaneous and easy to play. Move, Build, delete, fly, jump and save. All of this is FREE!!!
Enjoy this addictive world builders paradises.
Your new goal is get the five stars. Choose the terrain, move through your world and make it remarkable and perfect.
Start crafting your visions. Create or reproduce your perfect kingdom by using many different items.

Feel free to share your experience in comments and say what amelioration you want to see in the upcoming days, what houses, car you wish to build and what new features you expect. Please help us grow by sending your feedback and give us 5*. Note that the game is currently in beta.

description:
Children love colors, children love russian dolls and children love candy... why not combine the three? "Russian Dolls" is a beautiful, colourful and addictive game that your children will adore.

In this ‘thimblerig’ style game, your child must uncover the "Russian Dolls" that contains the candy! At the start of every game, the player will be shown where the candy is to be hidden, once hidden, the candy will be out of sight... the dolls will be moved around and it is your job to keep your eyes on the one containing the candy - then you will be able to see if you were right! Each dolls greets you with quirky looks and rainbow colors - and you child will love how beautiful the game is.

The music is comforting and great whenever you or your child needs to relax... "Russian Dolls" is fun but is also great because it aids your child’s development - improving visual memory skills, providing eye-exercise and improving focus, too. 

The awe-inspiring gameplay perfectly meets the end of a day, "Russian Dolls" is a lovely way to wind down towards the closing of a busy day. Your child can play before bedtime, in the morning or whenever they’re bored and they will be kept entertained as they concentrate on the majestic dolls.

"Russian Dolls" is beautifully simple, greeted with a classic game that has been around for centuries; yet remastered for young children of all ages - even adults can fall in love with the game they may have played with as a child. Although however simple "Russian Dolls" may be, it also contains wonderful surprises along the way. As you climb the leaderboards and whizz past various levels, you will be astonished with enchanting surprises that leave you wonderstruck and make the "Russian Dolls" exciting and extreme with every passing level.

We welcome your feedback and thank you for trying our games!

Features:

★Beautiful, relaxing animations

★Fun, addictive gameplay

★Gentle, soothing music

★Enchanting surprises that will leave you and your child wonderstruck

★Leaderboard integration

★Great for children and adults of any age!

description:
BACKSTORY

You are Seth Serrenson, former mercenary and now a ward of the Viscountess Bayette D'Lasio. She provides you with free room and board in exchange for your services: You are attempting to uncover the truth about who it is that murdered her husband.

Lately, though, your services have taken a different turn. You have been tasked with retaliating against goblins, whose raids on the nearby villages have become more frequent.

So, armed with only your favorite hand-axe, you move in on a group of goblins to save a small town currently under attack.

That's where our story begins.


GAME PLAY

Game play involves some action and fighting, but some of it is also problem-solving (read: puzzles and riddles). I tried to code the game so that casual gamers can complete it, but hardcore gamers can opt for the challenge of getting a higher score by killing more goblins in challenging environments. 

Most of the combat play should be fairly intuitive. The axe icon represents Seth's axe, and it is the only weapon he will use in this game. You have to, of course, be in close proximity to an enemy to successfully hit him when you attack him.

The joystick on the left controls movement. There is also a jump button (the one that looks like a foot).

Please note that there are also "dialogue trees" in this game. People who play RPGs regularly will know all about this. You will be having a conversation with someone in the game, and you will be presented with options for your part of the dialogue. You can pick any one of the options BUT YOU MUST PICK ONE. Simply touch the option to select it.

I put some code in place to prevent the camera from going through the walls in the dungeon. It works about 70-80% of the time. When it does work, it simply zooms in on the back of Seth's head. This is just to prevent the camera from going outside of the dungeon. Sometimes it doesn't work, and I'll look at that for the next game. 

If this is received fairly well, I'll go ahead and crank out a sequel. I already have the outline for that in mind.

As usual, I cut corners as much as possible to get under Google's 50Mb limit. And we just barely made it this time!

Any issues, feel free to drop me an email.

description:
An exciting game Tap Dash Run is offered to your attention.

This modern novelty belongs to the class of educational games. 
The development of imagination, creative thinking, fantasy, perseverance and dedication, as well as the calculation of earned points will help the child to learn softly and with interest. 
Tap Dash Run is a colorful game for kids with built arcade and obstacles. Small animals controlled by the player, overcome difficulties. 
The characters get bonuses in the form of precious stones for high speed and for the quality of passing each level.
Tasks and rules for the user - You control an animal that you’ve chosen at the start. This animal turns out to be in a maze. 
It moves along a narrow path, which breaks sometimes. 
The main task of the player is to help the hero to overcome all difficulties on the road, or rather jump over obstacles, 
so that the little animal doesn’t fall in the abyss. You will have to tap jump change direction to complete the task. 
Funny little creatures jump and turn thanks to player’s reactions.
In the kids game tap dash run, the player performs two basic actions, he jumps (taps) and turns. 
The challenge lies in the fact that the speed increases, the location changes abruptly, and deadlocks appear suddenly. 
The player’s attention must be uttermost because the complexity of the route is unpredictable. 
Luminous pointers in the circles are the hints to help you. You should press on them function "tap jump" in order to achieve the best results when making a deft jump.
Interesting details of the game -There is 216 levels in this game; having passed them, you climb up the league table, opening up new possibilities and supplements. 
Reaching new levels is based on speed and on game progresses. Therefore, it is advisable not to make mistakes and not to overuse restart. 
The difficulty increases with the opening of new levels: the speed of hero’s movement becomes higher, you tap jump change direction, and new path unlock.
Also, after transition to the next platform other funny animals become available. The appearance of the original animal jump - the cat - will change. 

For beginners, such an addition as "the snail" can help to simplify playing by slowing down the movement of pet.
Like other learning games for kids , 
"TAP DASH RUN" provides an opportunity to open or to buy favorite animals. Bright colors, beautiful background design and constant changes of the character provide avoiding monotony. 
There is a function of saving achievements and progress.
Rating of characters and players - The success of the game, or rather of each passed level, will be fixed in a special rating table. 
It gives you an opportunity to see your own game dynamics, and to discover cover the achievement of other players, including your friends. 
In this game you can share your result with friends in social networks just in one click.
Fun pastime, many emotions and pleasure are guaranteed! Tap Dash Run is a tap game. 
This is not only a game for boys or for girls. Both kids and adults will like this arcade with colorful graphics. Despite the simplicity, the game is really enthralling.
Here are the main particularities of this application, simple and clear design, colorful graphics, enthralling story, simple installing, big number of levels, games for toddler.

Download Tap Dash Run for free now. Good luck Play Fun!
short_desc: Let's start your Tap Dash Run now!!!
what_is_new: Update map and fix bug
title: Tap Dash Run

description:
Hey Alex! Our playground has been taken over! Only you can help us take it back! 

Prepare for an epic battle to defend your treehouse against those pesky kids from the next street over! 

Playground Wars features: 

• Gorgeous, detailed art and animation! 

• 112 HAND CRAFTED levels spread out over 4 unique seasonal campaigns! 

• 5 different weather conditions, 4 locations and night and day scenarios allow for an insane amount of variety! 

• Take command of your hero Alex, and recruit 9 additional friends to take on the bully menace! 

• Defend against a variety of enemy units, including 4 bosses before encountering the very special, epic final Mega Tank! 

• Unlock unique and powerful PERKS to use in battle to gain a crucial advantage! 

• Earn MARBLES and MEGA MARBLES to spend on over 400 upgrades! Level up your units, buy them armor, give them splash damage, increased movement and attack speed, and special offensive and defensive capabilities. 

• An advantage system balances the units against each other - the big guys don't like getting wet, triker units fear the pikemen and, of course, the bosses don't know what to do about Alex! 

• The weather and time of day system gives strength and weaknesses to your friends. The soakers are great in the cold, less effective in the rain. Your little toddlers cost more to recruit at night but love to play in the snow! Learn these affinities to plan the perfect strategy for each level! 

• Original soundtrack comprising 5 epic songs accompanying detailed and thrilling sound effects! 

• Finely tuned unit AI and combat mechanics! 

Playground Wars is a highly accessible defense game with an underlying layer of depth that takes the genre to an unprecedented level! Will YOU answer the call and take back the playground? The battle is on - in PLAYGROUND WARS!
short_desc: Hey Alex! Our playground has been taken over! Only you can help us take it back!
title: Playground Wars

description:
It was one early morning when our puppy's nap was disturbed by an unusual green one eyed and quite rude visitor...

Driven by both boredom and curiosity, little puppy started following the intriguing intruder. But then, like so many other heroic stories, something unexpected happened; Puppy tripped over a rock into a mysterious unusual hole in ground. This very unusual hole was no normal hole, but a portal to another peculiar and very distant dimension – a home to strange looking monsters with unusual abilities… 
And this is how the tales of a small but rather brave puppy begun.

Help our brave little puppy fight his way back home to his cozy doghouse and bowl full of delicious treats. Jump, dash and fly in order to save him from the strange looking monsters! If you fight right, you might get to see how the puppy tales end.

How to play: 
- Tap the jump button to jump and the action button to use your special abilities
- Jump on the monsters to destroy them 
- Collect tags, dog biscuits and coins to reach a better score
- Use different charms to enhance your performance
- Get upgrades, charms and costumes to diversify your gaming experience in the store

Highlights: 
- Many challenging and engaging levels 
- 3 different wonder worlds to explore
- Amazing abilities little puppy can learn and use
- Unique enemies to pop and squash
- Puppy costumes, power ups and upgrades in a cool store
- Interactive tutorials

description:

忍びの里を育てて、天下統一をめざすシミュレーションです。

description:
Discover the adventure with Bondi Band. Free the citizens of Tornasol Ville that have been hypnotized. They are not hard to find, but you’ll have to run until your last breathe. In the journey you’ll have to avoid the enemies and jump all the holes… Falling in it’s never a nice option!

But not everything is dangerous in the awesome world of Bondi Band: You can grab coins… and more coins and drive completely nuts over coins! With them you will discover new ways of playing and reunite all the team of Bondi Band.


FEATURES

- Run as far as you can, don’t stop! Discover the 4 incredible sceneries and save Tornasol Ville!
- Each scenery it’s full of unexpected dangerous creatures. Be careful!
- Grab the coins as fast as you can, you’ll need them to increase the game experience.
- Every time you find an enemy you can avoid it or fight against it by jumping on his head.
- You’ll find some super power ups that will made you a Rock Superhero! 
- Reunite the six member of Bondi Band! Each one of them have their own way of rocking and having fun! 


STORY

Many years ago, when only reptiles walked on this lands, a giant pink meteorite hit the Earth. It falled from the sky so fast that it was buried for hundred of years.

The legend tells that the person that found that big stone will gain incredible powers… If he or she can manage it. Nowadays, in the lands where the meteorite crashed years ago, a city was built: Tornasol Ville… 

C. Lebrity lives in that Ville, she’s a beautiful, unique and heartless woman that want to use the meteorite for evil. That’s why she have hypnotize all the citizens in the ville, to have them under her spell and make them do whatever she wants: Dig… Dig until their last breath until they find the pink meteorite.

Peter Solfa is the protector of this secret and was sent many years ago to space to control everything that happens on Earth. That’s why when he founds out about the situation, he calls Bondi Band, the most rocking kids on the planet! 
Peter give each one of them a ‘good-luck charm’ called Hexarock, and with it they acquire exceptional powers-.

That's how each member of Bondi Band enter the dangerous and chaotic Tornasol Ville and try to save all the hypnotized citizens. C. Lebrity has her own plans and will make their job difficult sending her villains. 

It might sound unrealistic and completely crazy, but stay alert! You are now a member of Bondi Band and the fear that you’ll fight is very real. Now, the prosperity of Tornasol Ville is in your hands.
title: Bondi Band

description:
Eat cells that are smaller than you and you’ll keep growing to consume them all - but watch our for cells bigger than you! Infinite Dots is a take on the popular browser game Agar.io, but with some twists. The agar plate that acts as your game scene is infinite and compared to Agario Infinite Dots is much simpler.

So the objective is simple: become the biggest cell of them all in this infinite agar plate!

An online leaderboard compares your scores to others all over the world! Grow bigger one touch at a time and challenge your friends.

Infinite Dots Features:

Minimalist Gameplay Is Great For Kids And Adults
- This game is very simple and suitable for both kids and adults as it’s challenging yet rewarding. With a minimalist design you only use one touch at a time to move your circle in order to grow even bigger.

Endless Gameplay For An Impossible Challenge
- Infinite Dots has no end! You can keep playing forever, and that’s the big challenge. How big can your cell become. As a contrary to the original game Agar.io this game uses different levels where cells will move even quicker as you progress. At some speeds it can feel impossible - but rest assure, it’s not!

Quick Restarts For Endless New Games
- Instantly restart your game when you get a Game Over! No loading screens means no waiting. This addicting challenge will have you racing to start a new game every time, and the lack of loading times means you’ll never get angry at this tough but fair challenge.

Compare Your Scores With Friends on the Leaderboards
- How many cells will you consume to reach the top of the leaderboard? Keep calm and your scores will trend higher and higher! 

Share Your Best Scores on Social Media
- Dare your friends, family and kids to beat your highest scores by sharing over social media and text messages. Just don’t get angry when their scores best yours, and you have to take up the challenge once more!


Infinite Dots is a whole new take on the hit game Agario that’s powered by the sleek and innovative design philosophies of the indie game community.

Download Infinite Dots today, and may the best cell win!
short_desc: Become the biggest cell of them all in this infinite agar plate!
what_is_new: Updated smoothness in game play.
title: Infinite Dots

description:
"Mame4all and all" is an enhancement of "MAME4ALL Android". This is a network arcade player.

Features
------------
Supported MAME games and some other types.
Combination key is supported.
Play through WiFi networking.
2D Hardware Accelerated.
Autorotate.
Touch Controller can be shown/hidden.
Smooth image.
HW Keys remapping.
Animated touch stick or DPAD.
Wiimote support using WiiCrotroller Market app.
1 to 6 buttons optionally shown.
Options for video aspect ratio, scaling, rotate.


MAME originally stood for Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator.
MAME's purpose is to preserve decades of software history. As electronic technology continues to rush forward, MAME prevents this important "vintage" software from being lost and forgotten. This is achieved by documenting the hardware and how it functions. The source code to MAME serves as this documentation. The fact that the software is usable serves primarily to validate the accuracy of the documentation (how else can you prove that you have recreated the hardware faithfully?). Over time, MAME absorbed the sister-project MESS (Multi Emulator Super System), so MAME now documents a wide variety of (mostly vintage) computers, video game consoles and calculators, in addition to the arcade video games that were its initial focus.

More about MAME:
http://mamedev.org/


Notice:Please respect the copyright of roms. Thanks!

description:
Kingturn is an addictive turn-based fantasy strategy RPG with a depth rarely found on mobile devices.

'A Brilliant Tactical Battle Game' [TouchArcade review]

The game combines outpost conquering with tactical combat and a complex unit skill system. 
Embedded in a compelling medieval fantasy story with quirky characters, the player can delve into this old school tactics game for many hours.

Kingturn marks the 2nd chapter of our Kingturn trilogy, and offers a few exclusive character classes like Summoners and Tricksters.

If you are new to our Kingturn series, you might want to watch the video tutorial first:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=RRpli7agW4E


Story
---------
The young mage and scholar Nicolette becomes the new ruler of the earldom of Montbelliard after her lord-father has passed away peacefully.
Having not come of age, yet, Nicolette finds herself unprepared for the games of power played by the other noble houses.
Surrounded by enemies and with the prospect of marrying an unknown noble for political reasons only, her fate takes its course ...


Game play
---------------
- Many hours of addictive and challenging game play in 67 scenarios (main campaign)

- A skirmish campaign with 20+ additional scenarios

- 30 character classes like Knight, Archer, Mage, Paladin, Assassin, Warrior, Wolf Rider, Priest, Summoner, Trickster, Witch, Necromancer, Vampire, Ghost, Griffin ...

- 60 character skills like 'Heal', 'Stealth', 'Lightning Bolt', 'Living Bomb', 'Inferno', 'Whirlwind', 'Summon', 'Confusion Shot', 'Blood Bolt', 'Firestorm', 'Spin Attack', 'Arrow Hail', ...

- More than 700 items (weapons, armor, amulets, rings)

- Battle drops, treasure chests, and scenario rewards

- Conquer outposts and face a challenging enemy AI (Artificial Intelligence)

- Level up an army which is carried over from scenario to scenario
title: Kingturn RPG

Having successfully crossed more than 3 Million users in NOKIA OVI store, We are happy to release the same game for Android as well.

This Snakes and Ladders game is a popular dice game played widely throughout the world by all age group players.

Excellent time pass game where players can see how progress/ downfall happens based on the ladder/ snake positions in the game, that is how it is for a soul to reach ultimate liberation in life.

This game uses Traditional 132 cells as the main game board . 

Also, this game follows following traditional gaming rules,
1. During the game play, When a player gets dice value=1, he gets one more chance to roll the dice again. 
2. Two dices are used to play the game.

History: 
Snakes and Ladders game which is also called as Paramapadam, was created in ancient India. Paramapadam was inspired by religion and was believed to be symbolic of a soul's attempt to reach ultimate liberation in life. The ladders represent virtues and the snakes represent vices.
short_desc: "Snakes and Ladders" is a popular dice game.

title: Snakes And Ladders

description:
Game Description: 

The Cat Monk is an irresistible casual action game where a stationary levitating Cat Monk fights the Creatures, Monsters and Weapons with simple "Tap" controls. 

The game has three unique exciting modes. 

* ARCADE MODE - in this mode the player has to play for a limited time and make the BEST SCORE out of it. 

* CLASSIC MODE - in this mode the player can play as long as he/she can without losing the health of The Cat Monk and making the BEST SCORE. 

* SURVIVAL MODE - in this mode the player has to survive 3 intense rounds to WIN. 

In each of these modes the player will be rewarded with unique ranks and gems. Once the player achieves all the ranks in three modes he will be rewarded with an Ultimate title called “THE ENLIGHTENED WARRIOR”. 

In each mode you can compete with your friends for the highest score on leader boards & share your achievements on leading social networks. 

Cat Monk just doesn't fight with his bare hands, he is well versed with different weapons and he possess some super powers. Upgrade the powers and Equip the weapons in Upgrades Menu by using the gems bought with real currency or earned in the game. 

Story: 

The Black Crow Witch is in search of the sacred Temple of the Mystical Warrior sends her troops of Lava Monsters, Flying Chimers and Weapons of destruction to conquer the temple by taking over the control from the levitating monk. 

Now it’s your turn to protect the Temple of Mystical warrior and earn the title of “The Enlightened Warrior” by unlocking the 6 gates. 

Go grab a copy and test your Kung Fu skills.

description:
Thế giới rồng 2 - Vinh quang kỵ sĩ

Từ thời thượng cổ khi mà các vị thần đã rời bỏ đại lục Jonas,đã xuất hiện 1 quái vật khủng bố được các cổ dân lúc ấy gọi là Tà Thần.Hắn mang đến rất nhiều tai nạn và tử vong đến khắp đại lục.Khi ấy xuất hiện 1 Mỵ Ảnh Kị Sỹ là tộc nhân của Long Tộc,với sức mạnh và lòng dũng cảm của mình anh đã xua đuổi Tà Thần quay về thế giới của hắn,và cứu sống tất cả sinh vật trên toàn đại lục Jonas.

Nhưng không ngờ nhiều năm sau đó,khi cuộc chiến của 2 cha con Michael và Bahamut lại vô tình dẫn đến 1 tai nạn.Phải nói là 1 tai nạn có thể hủy diệt toàn đại lục.Đó là tà thần 1 lần nữa lại chuẩn bị tiến vào đại lục Jonas.Khác với lần trước lần này hắn mang theo quân đoàn ma quỷ của hắn cùng lòng báo thù và quan trọng nhất là không có 1 kẻ nào có thể ngăn cản hắn ta.

Sự việc tiếp diễn như thế thì thế giới sẽ bị hủy diệt trong 1 thời gian ngắn mà thôi.Ai sẽ ngăn cản hắn ta.Micheal và những người bạn của Kỵ Sỹ Đoàn của mình có thể không?Các bạn hãy chơi và tự cảm nhận hòa mình vào 1 thế giới mới và các cuộc phiêu lưu mới trên bước chân của Michael qua Thế Giới Rồng II-Vinh Quang Kỵ Sĩ

Nhựng thay đổi trong phần này:
+ Đồ họa đẹp hơn.
+ Cốt truyện lôi cuốn hơn.
+ Nâng cấp thêm chức năng đấu trường để bạn có thể luyện cấp.

Game đã loại bỏ hoàn toàn quyền gửi tin nhắn (no sms). Hãy cùng khám phá Thế giới của rồng ngay!

description:
Imagine a deadly racing game - where you are the pedestrian!

Chicken Jump is an easy to grab and funny party game set in a town like no other, in which residents celebrate by jumping over waves of wacky traffic. Avoid being crushed as long as you can by jumping at the right time and get the highest score in town to impress your friends! 

SOLO MODE TO MASTER YOUR SKILLS : experience the jumping festival insanity alone if you dare! Progress and unlock new content peacefully, undisturbed by your giggling friends.

1-8 PLAYER MULTIPLAYER FUN : play with friends on the same screen or try to control as many players as you can by yourself. 

EMBRACE CHAOS : smiles on faces guaranteed due to carefully designed physics-based-humour-engine AKA pure chaos.

MADDENINGLY SIMPLE : one-touch controls make the game very accessible. Get ready to jump, jump and jump again.

A PARTY GAME FOR EVERYONE : 8 hilarious arcade game modes such as high score and last man standing and many other mini-games to discover. 

UNLOCK SPECIAL SKILLS AND ENVIRONMENTS : loads of unlockable character classes with different special abilities: police slows down traffic, scientists let you start at higher waves, aliens that alter the scenery and many more.

COLLECT CARDS TO INCREASE SKILLS : card mechanic, some classes’ abilities increase - the more characters you have from the same set, the better they become!

PLAYED BY MILLIONS AND COUNTING, ENDORSED BY THE GREATEST YOUTUBERS : 25M sessions launched on desktop and PewDiePie's big smile after being hit by a frenzied car can’t be wrong, Chicken Jump is pure jumping joy!

No internet connection required to push your jumping talent to the limit. Chicken Jump is your perfect friend on the go! 

***

description:
Explosions and fireworks, thunder and demolition - it's that simple! Light the fuse and make some 'Boooom!' in Demolition Master 3D: Holidays.

In Demolition Master 3D: Holidays you need to explode everything standing in your way. The most important thing is to plant your explosives correctly. Careful bomb placement will yield bigger, more effective explosions, blast after blast! Use your skill to launch debris in specific directions to hit targets and score big points. Plus, of course, have the most fun in the process!

To finish with a perfect score, you'll have to put your thinking cap on. Fortunately, our bombs grow on trees, so you'll never run out. And as a last resort, there's always the 'Total Annihilation' superbomb…

60 locations with fascinating logical tasks, amazing 3D graphics and many many blasts are waiting for you! Burn!

KEY FEATURES:

✔ 60 arcade levels. That's a lot to blow up!
✔ Explosive visual effects. Enjoy the Booooom!
✔ Cool music. Get on down!
✔ Holiday atmosphere for your explosive fun!
✔ Social gaming network OpenFeint (leaderboards & achievements). Feed your hunger not only for demolition, but also for fame!
✔ 3 bomb types (Standard, Advanced and Special). Blasts are your passion, aren't they?
✔ And a superbomb - the Tsar Bomb of explosive weapons!
short_desc: What makes a great holiday atmosphere?
title: Demolition Master 3D: Holidays

description:
Welcome to a great cartoon-art scrolling shooter game! 

Sky Raiders brings you an addictive and fun arcade game with fighter planes. You will battle squadrons of planes, helicopters and enemy bombers as you achieve upgrades to weapons and planes.

Gather enough energy so that you can upgrade your plane making it faster and more powerful or use it to unlock more powerful new planes. 

There are 6 different planes to choose from which will take your game play to the next tier. With 46 missions to conquer, you'll be playing for hours.

HOW TO PLAY
+ Drag the plane to move, double click or press the bomb icon to use the bombs.

FEATURES
+ Addictive gameplay for hours of action
+ 46 super levels to have fun
+ Lot of planes, helicopters, tanks and guns
+ More than 20 unique enemies 
+ Upgrades to your units
title: Sky Raiders - Battle Wars

description:
أركض بعيداً إذا أردت أن تبقى حياً، وإذا تعبت أركض أكثر ولا تستسلم، فالمدينة بأكملها تركض خلفك! إنها ليست كأي مدينة أخرى، إنها تشيكن تاون - مدينة الدجاج! 

إبدأ المغامرة مع ديكو واصدقائه ، الدجاج الهارب من أبلة زكية الطباخة التي لن ترتاح قبل أن تمسك بك! 

أركض مع ديكو وميمي والجدة فرخة في أنحاء المدينة، واجمع المكونات العجيبة، لتصنع منها البيض السحري! ولكن إحترس من أبلة زكية ! أهرب منها، و حلق بعيداً، أو إختبئ تحت الأرض، وإذا لم ينفع شيء معها إرمها بالبيض الفاسد! كن حذراً من التماسيح أيضاً فالجميع يسعى وراء البيض الذي معك!

+ مميزات اللعبة
* لعبة عربية جديدة فيها الكثير من الإثارة!
* العديد من الأصوات المضحكة التي تجعل تشيكن تاون لعبة فريدة من نوعها!
* إربح المكافأت العديدة على طول الطريق!
* إكسب البيض السحري كلما لعبت أكثر!

+ المئات من الجوائز لتكسبها !
* احصل على المكافآت اليومية لرفع مستوى الإثارة
* إصنع بيضتك المفضلة من الهدايا اليومية الرائعة

الأهم من كل ذلك، أنها لعبة مجانية، إلعب الآن!

- إختر شخصيتك المفضلة لديك وإبدأ مغامرة تشيكن تاون

لعبة تشيكن تاون من إنتاج شركة طماطم للألعاب، الشركة الرائدة في نشر الألعاب العربية على اجهزة الجوال.
ولا تنس تقييم اللعبة.
title: تشيكن تاون

description:
Collect some delicious fruits into a bucket in midst of a dreamy garden...

The whole new fruit carnival is completely rebooted version of our successful game. You can now play with a single hand and enjoy fun & gripping gameplay. Warning: this might get addictive!

The fruits appear in an interestingly unpredictable manner on the screen from all sides. Collect delicious fruits like Apples, oranges, and my favourite juicy melons by dragging them into the bucket. But watch out for those unwanted and annoying bombs! They would show up any time and blow up your precious bucket rolling you back to zero... Don't let them fall into your bucket!

Features:
- Simple minimalistic Graphics
- Simple yet addictive gameplay.
- Fun for children!
- Play game services integrated! Let the leaderboards fill up!
- And don't forget to unlock achievements!

More to follow soon! Keep checking for updates!

For any queries 'n comments, reach us at games@openxcell.com

Have fun!
